00045         dst = src;                                                                              \

00106 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvHdrCellEvent : public wxNotifyEvent
00107 {
00108 public:
00109         wxAdvHdrCellEvent()
00110         : wxNotifyEvent()
00111         {
00112                 m_hdrCell = NULL;
00113                 m_x = -1;
00114                 m_y = -1;
00115                 m_control = false;
00116                 m_shift = false;
00117                 m_alt = false;
00118                 m_meta = false;
00119         }
00120 
00121         wxAdvHdrCellEvent(int id, wxEventType type, wxObject* obj,
00122                         wxAdvHdrCell *hdrCell, int x = -1, int y = -1,
00123                         bool control = false, bool shift = false, bool alt = false, bool meta = false);
00124 
00125 
00126         wxAdvHdrCell *GetHdrCell() { return m_hdrCell; }
00127         wxPoint     GetPosition() { return wxPoint( m_x, m_y ); }
00128         bool        ControlDown() { return m_control; }
00129         bool        MetaDown() { return m_meta; }
00130         bool        ShiftDown() { return m_shift; }
00131         bool        AltDown() { return m_alt; }
00132         bool        CmdDown()
00133         {
00134 #if defined(__WXMAC__) || defined(__WXCOCOA__)
00135                 return MetaDown();
00136 #else
00137                 return ControlDown();
00138 #endif
00139         }
00140 
00141         virtual wxEvent *Clone() const { return new wxAdvHdrCellEvent(*this); }
00142 
00143 protected:
00144         wxAdvHdrCell *m_hdrCell;
00145         int         m_x;
00146         int         m_y;
00147         bool        m_control;
00148         bool        m_meta;
00149         bool        m_shift;
00150         bool        m_alt;
00151 
00152         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS_NO_ASSIGN(wxAdvHdrCellEvent)
00153 };

00161     wx__DECLARE_EVT1(wxEVT_ADVTABLE_ ## evt, id, wxAdvHdrCellEventHandler(fn))

00164 #define EVT_ADVTABLE_CMD_HDRCELL_RIGHT_CLICK(id, fn) wx__DECLARE_ADVHDRCELLEVT(HDRCELL_RIGHT_CLICK, id, fn)
00165 #define EVT_ADVTABLE_CMD_HDRCELL_LEFT_DCLICK(id, fn) wx__DECLARE_ADVHDRCELLEVT(HDRCELL_LEFT_DCLICK, id, fn)

00180 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvCoord
00181 {
00182 public:
00183         wxAdvCoord()
00184         {
00185                 Unset();
00186         }
00187 
00188         virtual ~wxAdvCoord()
00189         {
00190         }
00191 
00195         void Set(size_t row, size_t col)
00196         {
00197                 m_row = row;
00198                 m_col = col;
00199         }
00200 
00201         void operator = (const wxAdvCoord &o)
00202         {
00203                 m_row = o.m_row;
00204                 m_col = o.m_col;
00205         }
00206 
00207         bool IsSet()
00208         {
00209                 return (m_row != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col != UNDEF_SIZE);
00210         }
00211 
00212         void Unset()
00213         {
00214                 m_row = UNDEF_SIZE;
00215                 m_col = UNDEF_SIZE;
00216         }
00217 
00218         bool Equal(size_t row, size_t col)
00219         {
00220                 return (m_row == row) && (m_col == col);
00221         }
00222 
00227         size_t Row()
00228         {
00229                 return m_row;
00230         }
00231 
00236         size_t Col()
00237         {
00238                 return m_col;
00239         }
00240 
00241 private:
00242         size_t m_row, m_col;
00243 };

00248 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvRange
00249 {
00250 public:
00251         wxAdvRange()
00252         {
00253                 Unset();
00254         }
00255 
00256         wxAdvRange(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00257         {
00258                 Set(row1, col1, row2, col2);
00259         }
00260 
00261         virtual ~wxAdvRange()
00262         {
00263         }
00264 
00270         void Set(size_t row, size_t col)
00271         {
00272                 m_row1 = row;
00273                 m_col1 = col;
00274                 m_row2 = row;
00275                 m_col2 = col;
00276         }
00277 
00278         void Set(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00279         {
00280                 m_row1 = row1;
00281                 m_col1 = col1;
00282                 m_row2 = row2;
00283                 m_col2 = col2;
00284         }
00285 
00286         void Unset()
00287         {
00288                 Set(UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE);
00289         }
00290 
00295         bool IsSet()
00296         {
00297                 return (m_row1 != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col1 != UNDEF_SIZE) &&
00298                                 (m_row2 != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col2 != UNDEF_SIZE);
00299         }
00300 
00307         bool Contains(size_t row, size_t col)
00308         {
00309                 return (row >= TopRow() && row <= BottomRow()) &&
00310                                 (col >= LeftCol() && col <= RightCol());
00311         }
00312 
00316         bool IsSingleCell()
00317         {
00318                 return ((TopRow() == BottomRow()) &&
00319                                 (LeftCol() == RightCol()));
00320         }
00321 
00330         bool Equals(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00331         {
00332                 return (m_row1 == row1) && (m_col1 == col1)
00333                                 && (m_row2 == row2) && (m_col2 == col2);
00334         }
00335 
00336         void operator = (const wxAdvRange &o)
00337         {
00338                 m_row1 = o.m_row1;
00339                 m_col1 = o.m_col1;
00340                 m_row2 = o.m_row2;
00341                 m_col2 = o.m_col2;
00342         }
00343 
00344         size_t Row1()
00345         {
00346                 return m_row1;
00347         }
00348 
00349         size_t Row2()
00350         {
00351                 return m_row2;
00352         }
00353 
00354         size_t Col1()
00355         {
00356                 return m_col1;
00357         }
00358 
00359         size_t Col2()
00360         {
00361                 return m_col2;
00362         }
00363 
00364         size_t TopRow()
00365         {
00366                 return min(m_row1, m_row2);
00367         }
00368 
00369         size_t BottomRow()
00370         {
00371                 return max(m_row1, m_row2);
00372         }
00373 
00374         size_t LeftCol()
00375         {
00376                 return min(m_col1, m_col2);
00377         }
00378 
00379         size_t RightCol()
00380         {
00381                 return max(m_col1, m_col2);
00382         }
00383 
00384 private:
00385         size_t min(size_t a, size_t b)
00386         {
00387                 size_t m = wxMin(a, b);
00388                 if (m == UNDEF_SIZE) {
00389                         if (a != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00390                                 m = a;
00391                         }
00392                         else if (b != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00393                                 m = b;
00394                         }
00395                 }
00396                 return m;
00397         }
00398 
00399         size_t max(size_t a, size_t b)
00400         {
00401                 size_t m = wxMax(a, b);
00402                 if (m == UNDEF_SIZE) {
00403                         if (a != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00404                                 m = a;
00405                         }
00406                         else if (b != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00407                                 m = b;
00408                         }
00409                 }
00410                 return m;
00411         }
00412 
00413         size_t m_row1, m_col1;
00414         size_t m_row2, m_col2;
00415 };

00498 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvTableDataModel : public Observable<wxAdvTableDataModelObserver>
00499 {
00500 public:
00501         wxAdvTableDataModel();

00503 
00510         virtual wxString GetCellValue(size_t row, size_t col) = 0;
00511 
00519         virtual bool SetCellValue(size_t row, size_t col, wxString value) = 0;
00520 
00527         virtual int GetCellFormat(size_t row, size_t col) = 0;
00528 
00535         virtual bool IsCellEditable(size_t row, size_t col) = 0;
00536 
00545         virtual wxAdvCellAttribute *GetCellAttribute(size_t row, size_t col) = 0;
00546 
00554         virtual double GetCellValueDouble(size_t row, size_t col);
00555 
00556 protected:
00557         FIRE_WITH_VALUE2(CellChanged, size_t, row, size_t, col);
00558         FIRE_VOID(TableChanged);
00559 };

00957 
00971 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvHdrCell
00972 {
00973         friend class wxAdvTable;
00974         friend class wxAdvDefaultHdrCellRenderer;
00975 public:
00976 
00980         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxAdvHdrCell &o)
00981         {
00982                 // copy attributes
00983                 m_subCells = o.m_subCells;
00984                 m_label = o.m_label;
00985                 m_size  = o.m_size;
00986                 m_alignVertical = o.m_alignVertical;
00987                 m_alignHorizontal = o.m_alignHorizontal;
00988                 m_spacing = o.m_spacing;
00989                 m_verticalText = o.m_verticalText;
00990                 m_sortable = o.m_sortable;
00991                 m_resizeAllowed = o.m_resizeAllowed;
00992 
00993                 if (o.m_renderer != NULL) {
00994                         m_renderer = o.m_renderer->Clone();
00995                 }
00996                 else {
00997                         m_renderer = NULL;
00998                 }
00999 
01000                 // copy internals
01001                 m_rc = o.m_rc;
01002                 m_index = o.m_index;
01003                 m_isRow = o.m_isRow;
01004                 m_parent = o.m_parent;
01005                 m_subIndex = o.m_subIndex;
01006         }
01007 
01012         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxChar *label = wxT(""))
01013         {
01014                 m_label = label;
01015                 SetDefaults();
01016         }
01017 
01022         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxString &label)
01023         {
01024                 m_label = label;
01025                 SetDefaults();
01026         }
01027 
01028         virtual ~wxAdvHdrCell()
01029         {
01030                 wxDELETE(m_renderer);
01031         }
01032 
01038         wxAdvHdrCell &Sub(wxAdvHdrCell subHdrCell)
01039         {
01040                 subHdrCell.m_parent = this;
01041                 subHdrCell.m_isRow = m_isRow;
01042                 subHdrCell.m_subIndex = m_subCells.Count();
01043                 m_subCells.Add(subHdrCell);
01044                 return *this;
01045         }
01046 
01052         wxAdvHdrCell &Sub(const wxChar *label)
01053         {
01054                 return Sub(wxAdvHdrCell(label));
01055         }
01056 
01062         bool IsComposite()
01063         {
01064                 return m_subCells.Count() != 0;
01065         }
01066 
01073         wxAdvHdrCell &AlignVertical(int alignVertical)
01074         {
01075                 m_alignVertical = alignVertical;
01076                 return *this;
01077         }
01078 
01083         int AlignVertical()
01084         {
01085                 return m_alignVertical;
01086         }
01087 
01094         wxAdvHdrCell &AlignHorizontal(int alignHorizontal)
01095         {
01096                 m_alignHorizontal = alignHorizontal;
01097                 return *this;
01098         }
01099 
01104         int AlignHorizontal()
01105         {
01106                 return m_alignHorizontal;
01107         }
01108 
01113         wxAdvHdrCell &VerticalText()
01114         {
01115                 m_verticalText = true;
01116                 return *this;
01117         }
01118 
01123         bool IsVerticalText()
01124         {
01125                 return m_verticalText;
01126         }
01127 
01132         wxAdvHdrCell &Sortable()
01133         {
01134                 m_sortable = true;
01135                 return *this;
01136         }
01137 
01142         bool IsSortable()
01143         {
01144                 return m_sortable;
01145         }
01146 
01151         wxAdvHdrCell &ResizeAllowed()
01152         {
01153                 m_resizeAllowed = true;
01154                 return *this;
01155         }
01156 
01162         wxAdvHdrCell &Renderer(wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *renderer)
01163         {
01164                 wxREPLACE(m_renderer, renderer);
01165                 return *this;
01166         }
01167 
01172         wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *Renderer()
01173         {
01174                 return m_renderer;
01175         }
01176 
01182         wxAdvHdrCell &Spacing(wxCoord spacing)
01183         {
01184                 m_spacing = spacing;
01185                 return *this;
01186         }
01187 
01192         wxCoord Spacing()
01193         {
01194                 return m_spacing;
01195         }
01196 
01202         wxAdvHdrCell &Label(const wxString &label)
01203         {
01204                 m_label = label;
01205                 return *this;
01206         }
01207 
01212         const wxString &Label()
01213         {
01214                 return m_label;
01215         }
01216 
01223         wxAdvHdrCell &Size(wxCoord size)
01224         {
01225                 m_size = size;
01226                 return *this;
01227         }
01228 
01233         wxCoord Size()
01234         {
01235                 return m_size;
01236         }
01237 
01243         wxAdvHdrCell &MinSize(wxCoord minSize)
01244         {
01245                 m_minSize = minSize;
01246                 return *this;
01247         }
01248 
01253         wxCoord MinSize()
01254         {
01255                 return m_minSize;
01256         }
01257 
01263         wxAdvHdrCell &MaxSize(wxCoord maxSize)
01264         {
01265                 m_maxSize = maxSize;
01266                 return *this;
01267         }
01268 
01273         wxCoord MaxSize()
01274         {
01275                 return m_maxSize;
01276         }
01277 
01282         wxSize CalcExtent(wxDC &dc)
01283         {
01284                 wxSize extent = dc.GetMultiLineTextExtent(m_label);
01285 
01286                 extent.IncBy(2 * m_spacing);
01287                 //extent.IncBy(2 * m_spacing + sortArrowSize);
01288 
01289                 if (m_verticalText) {
01290                         // rotate by 90 degrees
01291                         wxCoord tmp = extent.x;
01292                         extent.x = extent.y;
01293                         extent.y = tmp;
01294                 }
01295 
01296                 if (m_size != 0) {
01297                         if (m_isRow) {
01298                                 extent.SetHeight(m_size);
01299                         }
01300                         else {
01301                                 extent.SetWidth(m_size);
01302                         }
01303                 }
01304                 return extent;
01305         }
01306 
01312         size_t Layers()
01313         {
01314                 size_t layers = 1;
01315                 size_t maxSubLayers = IsComposite() ? 1 : 0;
01316 
01317                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(nsub, m_subCells) {
01318                         if (m_subCells[nsub].IsComposite()) {
01319                                 size_t subLayers = m_subCells[nsub].Layers();
01320                                 if (subLayers > maxSubLayers)
01321                                         maxSubLayers = subLayers;
01322                         }
01323                 }
01324                 return layers + maxSubLayers;
01325         }
01326 
01332         size_t GetDecompCellCount()
01333         {
01334                 size_t count = 0;
01335 
01336                 if (!IsComposite()) {
01337                         return 1;
01338                 }
01339 
01340                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01341                         count += m_subCells[n].GetDecompCellCount();
01342                 }
01343                 return count;
01344         }
01345 
01350         bool IsRow()
01351         {
01352                 return m_isRow;
01353         }
01354 
01360         size_t Index()
01361         {
01362                 return m_index;
01363         }
01364 
01365         bool IsRightEdge()
01366         {
01367                 if (m_parent != NULL) {
01368                         return (m_subIndex == m_parent->m_subCells.Count() - 1);
01369                 }
01370                 return false;
01371         }
01372 
01373         wxAdvHdrCell *RightSibling()
01374         {
01375                 if (m_parent == NULL) {
01376                         return NULL;
01377                 }
01378 
01379                 if (m_subIndex < m_parent->m_subCells.Count() - 1) {
01380                         return &m_parent->m_subCells[m_subIndex + 1];
01381                 }
01382                 return NULL;
01383         }
01384 
01391         static size_t GetDecompCellCount(wxAdvHdrCell *cells, size_t numCells);
01392 
01393 private:
01394         //
01395         // Internal functions.
01396         //
01397         void MarkAsRow()
01398         {
01399                 SetIsRowRecursive(true);
01400         }
01401 
01402         void MarkAsCol()
01403         {
01404                 SetIsRowRecursive(false);
01405         }
01406 
01407         void SetIsRowRecursive(bool isRow)
01408         {
01409                 m_isRow = isRow;
01410 
01411                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01412                         m_subCells[n].SetIsRowRecursive(isRow);
01413                 }
01414         }
01415 
01416         void SetDefaults()
01417         {
01418                 m_size = 0;
01419                 m_alignVertical = wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL;
01420                 m_alignHorizontal = wxALIGN_CENTRE_HORIZONTAL;
01421                 m_spacing = 5;
01422                 m_verticalText = false;
01423                 m_sortable = false;
01424                 m_resizeAllowed = false;
01425 
01426                 m_renderer = NULL;
01427 
01428                 m_minSize = 0;
01429                 m_maxSize = 0;
01430 
01431                 m_index = UNDEF_SIZE;
01432 
01433                 m_parent = NULL;
01434                 m_subIndex = UNDEF_SIZE;
01435         }
01436 
01437         //
01438         // Variables.
01439         //
01440         wxAdvHdrCellArray m_subCells;
01441 
01442         wxString m_label;
01443         wxCoord m_size;
01444         wxCoord m_minSize;
01445         wxCoord m_maxSize;
01446 
01447         int m_alignVertical;
01448         int m_alignHorizontal;
01449 
01450         wxCoord m_spacing;
01451 
01452         bool m_verticalText;
01453 
01454         bool m_sortable;
01455         bool m_resizeAllowed;
01456 
01457         wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *m_renderer;
01458 
01459         wxAdvHdrCell *m_parent;
01460         size_t m_subIndex;
01461 
01462         //
01463         // used internally by wxAdvTable
01464         //
01465         // for wxAdvTable to store row/column position
01466         wxRect m_rc;
01467         size_t m_index;
01468         bool m_isRow;
01469 };

02290         {
02291                 return layerSizes.Count() - hdrCell.Layers();

02317         {
02318                 return (size_t) wxClip((int) row + incr, 0, (int) MaxRow());
02319         }
